What are the capabilities of the Verus multichain DeFi protocols, and how can they be accessed?

The Verus multichain DeFi protocols offer a range of capabilities that enable users to create and manage multiple identities, currencies, liquidity pools, and blockchains without requiring any programming knowledge. These capabilities include:

* Creating new identities, currencies, liquidity pools, and blockchains for various use cases, such as businesses, governments, projects, or personal purposes.
* Sending currencies worldwide on the same chain or across blockchains with ease.
* Converting currencies to others on the network without the need for an exchange, by sending to oneself and converting along the way.

These features are currently available on the Verus testnet, which is a full-featured, intrinsically decentralized multi-chain blockchain platform with an unlimited number of identities, currencies, liquidity pools, and blockchains. The Verus community is actively working on hardening and preparing the testnet protocols for mainnet release.

The Verus testnet can be accessed through the released versions of Verus Desktop and Verus CLI wallets, allowing users to try out these capabilities today. Verus PBaaS (Public Blockchains as a Service) offers a range of capabilities that go beyond those available on other decentralized platforms, making it a powerful tool for creating and managing complex blockchain-based systems.

All of these features are currently available on Verus testnet (VerusID is already on mainnet), and the community is in high gear, hardening and preparing the testnet protocols for mainnet release. The new Verus testnet is a full-featured, intrinsically decentralized multi-chain blockchain platform with an unlimited number of identities, currencies, liquidity pools, and blockchains. It is accessible from the released versions of Verus Desktop and Verus CLI wallets, and it is the beginning of a new age in crypto. There are so many things you can do with Verus that you cannot with any other cryptocurrency platform, and you can try them all today.
Capabilities which to our knowledge are not available on any other decentralized platform today
